trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Gardner
There were no other sightings in Gardner on or around April 23rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was out, practicing long exposure pictures of the stars, in particular the big dipper, which was directly over head this night. i started looking for other stars to take pictures of, just exercising some night, long exposure practice shots. i noticed what didn't look normal to me off to the west. i thought to take long exposure pictures of it. noticing the stars overhead were moving ever so slowly, i noticed this object was moving particularly faster. i snapped a few shots, took a few video shots, but those didn't turn out. the pictures that i did get, i layered with photoshop, adjusted the layers so that the trees were aligned and the telephone pole and wires. i got this picture that i labeled ufo.jpg as the result. clear movement. i also had prior to this, two planes, in their normal patterns it seemed, fly over head. i have pictures of those to compare to. working in the aviation field as i do, faa a&p licensed and work at an airport now, knowing the navigation light requirements, i can compare the pictures of the planes i know were planes, and see the strobe patterns, the streak of the red\green lights. this object i have here, is just glowing. i took precedence to report this as well, though late, as i was reviewing other reports. i noticed that a firefighter on duty reported seeing a glowing object on fire west of gardner as well. this may be similar, so it might help build a bigger picture in the end. if anyone wants to know camera details, please get in touch with me. basically, camera was on sturdy all metal tripod, as i was already setup taking pictures of the constellations. camera is canon sx110is (image stabilizer). 6 second exposures for each image.
